definition: to procrastinate/to shilly-shally and waste time

sentences.english: Bachu mushroom has more adapt to soil nutrient.
sentences.chinese: 巴楚蘑菇对土壤营养条件有很强的适应性。

sentences.english: I can still taste the pickled chicken feet and mushroom appetizers.
sentences.chinese: 我还尝过腌过的鸡爪和蘑菇开胃菜。

sentences.english: A little rabbit is picking mushrooms in a forest. A wolf is coming. He is very hungry.
sentences.chinese: 一只小兔子正在森林里采蘑菇，一只狼来了，他很饿。

sentences.english: So Mary stood in the circle and then something strange happened.1
sentences.chinese: 于是玛丽站在了蘑菇圈里，接着奇怪的事发生了。

sentences.english: And the nutrition will also be lost if we use the iron or copper pan to cook the mushrooms.
sentences.chinese: 煮蘑菇时也不能用铁锅或铜锅，以免造成营养损失。

sentences.english: Tofu and mushrooms have their own unique flavours.
sentences.chinese: 豆腐和蘑菇有自己独特的风味。

sentences.english: Without remedies, the two men who ate poisonous mushroom died within days.
sentences.chinese: 由于没有药物，那两个吃了毒蘑菇的人几天后就死了。

sentences.english: And the next thing I know, I am on the ground harvesting chanterelles.
sentences.chinese: 不知不觉的，我又在地上捡酒杯蘑菇了。

sentences.english: On the other hand, poison mushrooms decreaseOnion's energy.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，减少毒蘑菇洋葱的能源。

sentences.english: A little rabbit is picking mushrooms in a forest .
sentences.chinese: 一只小兔子正在森林里采蘑菇。

sentences.english: The volva of the mushroom is often at the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 蘑菇的菌托通常在底部。

sentences.english: The player would be justified in discontinuing play and requesting the Committee to remove the mushroom.
sentences.chinese: 这名球员可以停止比赛，然后要求委员会移走蘑菇。

sentences.english: The mushroom is a speciality here.
Moogle is a tiny mushroom, who was born in Funsroom Village.
sentences.chinese: 蘑菇点点出生在菌菇村。

sentences.english: Aside from hallucinogenic properties, mushrooms can also kill.
sentences.chinese: 蘑菇除了能引起幻觉的性能外，也能致命。

definition: variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
enoki mushroom (Flammulina velutipes, Japanese えのき茸 enokitake), used in cuisines of Japan, Korea and China, cultivated to be long, thin and white/abbr. to 金菇
matsutake (Tricholoma matsutake), edible mushroom considered a great delicacy in Japan
